name: Versailles 1685
description:
This script will install "Versailles 1685" DOS/Windows CD edition for Dosbox.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- This script requires cdrdao and toc2cue to be installed. 
On Debian and Ubuntu type in a terminal: 
sudo apt-get install cdrdao
- You will need the 2 CD only one time during install
- During gaming, type "CTRL+F4" to change CD1 to CD2
- Script compatible CD DOS or CD Hybrid DOS/Windows
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/
content:
custom-name: Versailles 1685 - CD DOS/Windows - DOSBOX
files:
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/mlls-tools/raw/master/scripts/copycd.sh
- conf: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Versailles%201685/versailles-1685_dosbox.conf
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/versailles-1685_dosbox.conf
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: DATAS_V/CDVER1.BIN
- chmodx: script
- execute:
    args: VERSAILL_1
    file: script
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 2
    requires: DATAS_V/CDVER2.BIN
- execute:
    args: VERSAILL_2
    file: script
- task:
    commands:
    - imgmount d VERSAILL_1.cue VERSAILL_2.cue -t iso
    - 'd:'
    - INSTALL.EXE
    - exit
    drives:
      c: .
    name: makeconfig
    path: $GAMEDIR/versailles-1685_dosbox_install.conf
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/versailles-1685_dosbox_install.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: conf
